      • getDeviceCountry

        public static Country getDeviceCountry(android.content.Context context,
                                       Country defaultCountry)
        Gets the country code corresponding to the device (via getDeviceCountry(Context). If country cannot be determined, the default country is returned.
        Parameters:
        context - context through which to access resources.
        Returns:
        The current device country if found, or defaultCountry if none found.

      • getDeviceCountry

        public static Country getDeviceCountry(android.content.Context context)
        Gets the country code corresponding to the device. The country detection is done in the following order:
        1. If the device has telephony features and a SIM card is available, the country alpha2 is obtained via TelephonyManager.getSimCountryIso()
        2. The country alpha2 is extracted from the device Locale via Locale.getCountry(). On Android-Build.VERSION_CODES.N and newer, all enabled device locales are checked for a match.
        Parameters:
        context - context through which to access resources.
        Returns:
        The current device country if found, or null if none found.
